title: Introducing Oneself
introduction: This lesson covers a conversation where someone introduces himself to a local in French.

story.speaker: speaker1
story.message: Bonjour, je m'appelle Thomas. Je suis touriste ici.
story.translation: Hello, my name is Thomas. I am a tourist here.

story.speaker: speaker2
story.message: Enchanté, Thomas! Je m'appelle Marie. D'où venez-vous?
story.translation: Pleased to meet you, Thomas! My name is Marie. Where are you from?

story.speaker: speaker1
story.message: Je viens des États-Unis. Et vous, vous êtes d'ici?
story.translation: I come from the United States. And you, are you from here?

story.message: 'D'où venez-vous?' means 'Where do you come from?'. It's a common question when meeting someone new.

story.speaker: speaker2
story.message: Oui, je suis née ici. Qu'est-ce qui vous amène dans notre ville?
story.translation: Yes, I was born here. What brings you to our city?

story.speaker: speaker1
story.message: Je suis ici pour découvrir la culture et la cuisine françaises.
story.translation: I am here to discover the French culture and cuisine.

story.speaker: speaker2
story.message: C'est fantastique! Il y a beaucoup de choses à voir et à faire ici. Avez-vous besoin de recommandations?
story.translation: That's fantastic! There are many things to see and do here. Do you need any recommendations?

story.speaker: speaker1
story.message: Oui, ce serait génial. Je cherche un bon restaurant français.
story.translation: Yes, that would be great. I am looking for a good French restaurant.

story.speaker: speaker2
story.message: Je vous recommande le restaurant La Belle Époque. Il est à dix minutes d'ici à pied.
story.translation: I recommend the restaurant La Belle Époque. It is ten minutes from here on foot.
